title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 204.5 - Appeal officer's report
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 204.5 - Appeal officer's report

State Regulations

The appeal officer shall prepare a report and make
recommendations to the commissioner. The recommendations may be in the form of
a proposed decision which will contain findings of fact and conclusions of law. This report, along with the entire record, shall be transmitted to the
commissioner, the counsel to the department, and the business entity that filed
the appeal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
204.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
